dict.acceptation: 地区，地域，地带；行政区，管辖区；（大气，海水等的）层，界，境；（学问等的）范围，领域；

sent.orig: Therefore we need to develop the region-based image retrieval system (RBIR) .
sent.trans: 因此，我们需要开发基于区域的图像检索技术(Region-basedimageretrievalsystem,RBIR)。

sent.orig: Guyuan region, aknown poor region, is in the south of Region of China.
sent.trans: 固原地区地处宁夏南部，是全国著名的贫困地区。

sent.orig: What is the advertising campaign time period? region? Publication time? region? On-air publication time, region?
sent.trans: 广告活动的时间、区域？广告的刊出、播出、使用时间、区域？

sent.orig: Fills the transformed region with red and draws the transformed region to the screen in red.
sent.trans: 用红色填充变换后的区域并用红色将其绘制到屏幕。

sent.orig: The region will formulate the plan for the integrated development of the Pearl River Region.
sent.trans: 要制定珠江三角洲地区一体化发展规划。
